enWisdom: Being pleased with this world is foolishness
Longing for this world brings about hatred

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَحُبَّ الدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّهَا أَصْلُ كُلِّ خَطِيئَةٍ وَمَعْدِنُ كُلِّ بَلِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: Keep away from love of this world, for it is the root of every misdeed and the source of every affliction

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ رَغِبْتُمْ فِي الدُّنْيَا أَفْنَيْتُمْ أَعْمَارَكُمْ فِي مَا لَا تَبْقُونَ لَهُ وَلَا يَبْقَى لَكُمْ
enWisdom: Indeed, if you crave after this world, you will waste your lives for that which you will not remain for and that which will not remain for you
Love of this world is the source of every misdeed
Love of this world gives rise to avarice

Wisdom: حَرَامٌ عَلَى كُلِّ قَلْبٍ مُتَوَلِّهٍ بِالدُّنْيَا أَنْ يَسْكُنَهُ التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: It is forbidden upon every heart which is inclined to this world that God-wariness should reside in it
The cornerstone of calamities is infatuation with this world

Wisdom: لِحُبِّ الدُّنْيَا صَمَّتِ الْأَسْمَاعُ عَنْ سَمَاعِ الْحِكْمَةِ وَعَمِيَتِ الْقُلُوبُ عَنْ نُورِ الْبَصِيرَةِ
enWisdom: For love of this world, listeners turn a deaf ear to [words of] wisdom and hearts become blind to the light of insight

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا مَا يُرْضِيهِ كَثُرَ تَجَنِّيهِ وَطَالَ تَعَدِّيهِ
enWisdom: One who seeks from this world that which pleases him, his crime [and sinfulness] increases and his transgression prolongs

Wisdom: مَنْ رَاقَهُ زِبْرِجُ الدُّنْيَا أَعْقَبَ نَاظِرَيْهِ كَمَهاً
enWisdom: Whoever is attracted by the dazzle of this world, it blinds both his eyes

Wisdom: مَنْ وَثِقَ بِغُرُورِ الدُّنْيَا [فَقَدْ] أَمِنَ مَخُوفَهُ
enWisdom: One who relies on the deceptions of this world considers himself safe from its perils

Wisdom: لَا يَحِنَّنَّ أَحَدُكُمْ حَنِينَ الْأَمَةِ عَلَى مَا زُوِيَ عَنْهُ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Let not any of you pine the way a servant girl pines, for that which has departed from him of this world
Love of wealth and praise do not go together
